task.title: Configuring 320 hours unit in the T3412 extended timer
task.shortdesc: Use timer t3412extendedForLpaUe to set 320 hours unit for LPA UE, and command svcAgreementProfile and psmApn to configure 320 hours unit for other T3412 extended timers.

step.cmd: Set the T3412 extended timer for LPA UE.
Set the power savings mode T3412 min timer unit.
Set the power savings mode T3412 timer unit.
Set the T3412 max 320 hour value.
Set NB-S1 mode power savings mode T3412 timer unit.
Set WB-S1 mode power savings mode T3412 timer unit.
